content.question:
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->

Respond to all parts of the question:

(a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Russia between 1990 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend in Russia.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about the military’s role in maintaining political legitimacy in Russia.

(c) Explain why military spending in Russia differs from military spending in Mexico.
